data.text:
@willemhuman @gillianoberholzer 
Hi Willie. If we had an option to delete folders, we would.

However, the issue here is that it is inconsistently showing us that there is images or not in the folders.

In other words, even if the name of the agent is not bold and red, i still have to check all the folders under their name to see if there is images to manually sort.
